markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 371 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Saving Throw** Will --- You cause any spells cast on the target to spill out their energy in harmful surges. The target must attempt a Will save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** Whenever the target becomes affected by a spell with a duration, the target takes 2d12 persistent force damage. Each time it takes persistent force damage from _spellwrack_, it reduces the remaining duration of spells affecting it by 1 round. Only a successful Arcana check against your spell DC can help the target recover from the persistent damage; the curse and the persistent damage end after 1 minute.
**Failure** As success, but the curse and persistent damage do not end on their own.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the persistent force damage is 4d12.
name: Spellwrack
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 371 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Curse a creature to be harmed when a spell is cast on it and lower the duration of its spells.
</summary>
summary: Curse a creature to be harmed when a spell is cast on it and lower the duration of its spells.
summary_markdown: Curse a creature to be harmed when a spell is cast on it and lower the duration of its spells.
text: Spellwrack Source Core Rulebook pg. 371 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Saving Throw Will --- You cause any spells cast on the target to spill out their energy in harmful surges. The target must attempt a Will save. Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success Whenever the target becomes affected by a spell with a duration, the target takes 2d12 persistent force damage. Each time it takes persistent force damage from spellwrack , it reduces the remaining duration of spells affecting it by 1 round. Only a successful Arcana check against your spell DC can help the target recover from the persistent damage; the curse and the persistent damage end after 1 minute. Failure As success, but the curse and persistent damage do not end on their own. Critical Failure As failure, but the persistent force damage is 4d12.
